item.title: Compress PDF Off line easily with the command line
item.description: I found this great tool to compress pdf (python script) from the command line. Requirements Make sure you have ghoscript installed. If not just run brew install ghoscript How to Copy source files from https://github.com/hkdb/cpdf to your bin directory (thatâ€™s defined in your env) eg. /usr/local/bin if you are on OSX. Then from your favorite terminal, just use one of the commands described in the readme of the project. Basic command:

item.title: Contact
item.description: This is an example of a custom shortcode that you can put right into your content. You will need to add a form action to the the shortcode to make it work. Check out Formspree for a simple, free form service.
